actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require reimbursement of road construction costs at water resources development projects under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Army, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires reimbursement of road construction costs at water resources development projects in Oklahoma Lake, Oklahoma, under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Army.

titles.title: A bill to require reimbursement of road construction costs at water resources development projects under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Army, and for other purposes.
